definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那灵感是来自保险丝盒与监狱的杂交么。
欧洲李和杏的杂交品种。

sentences.english: The figure in Japanese hybrid tended to be higher.
sentences.chinese: 以日系杂交原种有偏高的倾向。

sentences.english: The carcass performance and meat qualities of different hybridized combination finishing pigs was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同杂交组合育肥猪胴体品质和肉质特性。

sentences.english: The Tiandan303 is a genetic monogerm polyploid sugar beet hybrid.
sentences.chinese: 甜单303是甜菜遗传单粒型多倍体杂交种。

sentences.english: Why would anyone crossbreed a perfectly serviceable bear with an owl?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有人把像熊这样非常有用的生物跟枭杂交呢？

sentences.english: Objective The in situ hybridization method was used with signal amplification system for detecting G-protein expression in taste buds.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用原位杂交检测味细胞中G蛋白的表达。

sentences.english: The effects of four factors on techniques for seedling establishment of No-tillage seedling broadcasting cultivation of early hybrid rice were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了四个不同因素对杂交早稻免耕抛栽立苗的影响。

sentences.english: The necessary of developing hybrid rice in northern China was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了中国北方发展杂交稻的必要性。

sentences.english: So, it suggested that the mule chickens were the progeny of Guinea fowl and the black normal feather Wugu chicken.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本结果支持骡鸡是乌骨鸡和珍珠鸡的杂交后代。

sentences.english: The combining ability is important parameter of breeding on high photosynthesis hybrid pepper varieties.
sentences.chinese: 配合力是选育强光合杂交辣椒品种的重要参数。
过滤层析和杂交用耗材。

sentences.english: Transfusion, some feared, gave science a means to engineer new animal-human hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 一些人认为，输血为科学提供生物杂交的可能。

sentences.english: The Choice of Parents for Crossing in Bombyx mori L.
sentences.chinese: 家蚕杂交组合亲本选配方法研究进展。

sentences.english: Hybridization is also used for the improvement of yeast strains.
sentences.chinese: 杂交技术也被用于改良酵母菌株。

sentences.english: Growth and development traits of hybrid Pennistum were studied at the ecological condition of Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 研究了杭州生态条件下移栽杂交狼尾草的生育特性。
